original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)

original: 23.1. Kusalattika, Vedanāttika
analyzed: kusala attika vedanā attika

original: Namo tassa Bhagavato Arahato Sammāsambuddhassa.
analyzed: namaḥ tassa bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa

original: Nakusalaṁ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo sukhāya vedanāya
analyzed: na kusalam na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ sukhāya vedanāya

original: sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā dve

original: Naakusalaṁ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttañca naabyākataṁ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
